ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So you will see and they will see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So you will see, and they will realise,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So you will soon see, and they too will see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You will see and they will also see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So very soon, you will see and they too will realise –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: You will see, and they will see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So you shall see, and they (too) shall see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So thou shalt see, and they will see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And thou wilt see and they will see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Soon you will see, as will they,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Anon thou wilt see and they will see:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You will see and they will see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Soon wilt thou see, and they will see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: You will see, and they will see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You shall see and they will see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You will see, and they will see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So you will see and they will see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:5] Then you will see and they will see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And thou wilt see and they will see) you will see and know and they will see and know upon the descent of chastisement on them
